Articles.Content:
Hello fellow Kerbals!

I'm not sure if this is caused by this electronic gizmo (Mechjeb/KER) or some other thing, but I cannot seem to target Kerbin while trying to get back from the Mun. I either get the prompt to target one of satellites/stations orbitin Kerbin or nothing at all when trying to target Kerbin zoomed in. Similar thing trying to target the Mun while orbiting it. Any suggestions?
You can target something that is orbiting the same thing as you are but not the body you're orbiting. This is not a bug, it is just the way it is.

Well you *can* target it in map view. In the sense that the camera will center around planet you are orbiting. However for the maneuver modes, you cannot.

Why do you want to do this anyhow?

If you want to adjust inclination, use the Latitude readout from MechJeb.
